charges.charge_description: 21:846; Conspiracy to Distribute more than 500 grams of Methamphetamine

charges.charge_disposition: Seventy-six (76) months imprisonment, five (5) years supervised release, $800.00 fine and $100.00 Special Assessment. Signed by VAWD District Judge Glen E. Conrad on 2/25/2014.
